summary: This is an email chain from August 10, 2019, between FBI personnel in New York, forwarding contact information for Frank Depolo of the NYC Office of the Medical Examiner. The Medical Examiner was trying to reach the Bureau of Prisons regarding the Epstein case and was en route to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC).

persons.name: Frank Depolo
persons.role: NYC Office of the Medical Examiner contact
persons.context: His contact information is provided in the email as the Medical Examiner's representative who was trying to reach the Bureau of Prisons and was on the way to the MCC regarding the Epstein case.

events.title: Medical Examiner attempts contact regarding Epstein case
events.description: The NYC Office of the Medical Examiner was trying to reach the Bureau of Prisons and was on the way to the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) regarding the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 10, 2019, the day Jeffrey Epstein was found dead in his cell at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The NYC Office of the Medical Examiner was actively trying to reach the Bureau of Prisons and was en route to the MCC regarding the Epstein case.
Contact information for Frank Depolo of the NYC Office of the Medical Examiner was shared among FBI personnel to facilitate communication.
The document indicates immediate investigative activity following Epstein's death in custody.
